title: Generation Metadata
description: An object describing the settings used during a keycap generation invokation

layout_path.description: Path to the used KLE layout definition JSON file.

theme_path.description: Path to the used theme JSON file. This file must follow the schema 'assets/themes/theme-schema.json'.

preview_scale.description: The factor the resolution of the generated preview.png was scaled by.

texture_outlined_scale.description: The factor the resolution of the generated preview.png was scaled by.

texture_scale.description: The factor the resolution of the generated preview.png was scaled by.
